title: Purdue's School of Management launches Dean V. White Real Estate Finance Program - Purdue University
content: Purdue's School of Management launches Dean V. White Real Estate Finance Program  Purdue University
description: Purdue Universityâ€™s School of Management formally announced the Dean V. White Real Estate Finance Program on Friday (April 22) at its 2022 Krannert Alumni Awards Celebration Dinner. The new program, named in memory of the late Indiana entrepreneur in recognition of a $20.8 million pledge from the Dean and Barbara White Family Foundation, was approved on April 8 by Purdue trustees. The gift is the largest monetary contribution ever made to the School of Management.
